.
Examination Requirements for Diplopia
38 CFR 4.78
requires use of Goldmann Bowl kinetic perimeter testing or the Tangent Screen for examination of muscle function.  The examiner must document the results of muscle function testing by identifying the quadrant(s) and range(s) of degrees in which diplopia exists.  Documentation on a Goldmann Perimeter Chart is
not
required but is acceptable.
A diagnosis of diplopia that reflects the disease or injury that is the cause of the diplopia must be of record.
